title: Backgrounds
content: t for Counsellor Florrick and the Flaming Fist. Ketheric's Loss Learn Ketheric's past. Noble Feline Speak with the lordly cat at Last Light. Patrician of the Grove Recruit Halsin. Taxes? Never Heard of 'Em Don't give any gold to the toll collector. Top of the Ladder Meet Ketheric at the top of Moonrise. Alms for the Unfortunate Donate something to the refugees. Defamed No More Sabotage the printing press. Exerting Judgment End the squabbling between the merchant and the squatters. Interrupted Co
